mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /*+ insert_TB_CO_D_BSN_CTC */ TB_CO_D_BSN_CTC ( CORP_C /* 회사코드 */ , BSN_CTC_SQNO /* 업무연락일련번호 */ , RCST_ID /* 접수자ID */ , RC_STS_C /* 접수상태코드 */ , RC_DTM /* 접수일시 */ , RMK_CNTN /* 비고내용 */ , DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , FSRG_DTM /* 최초등록일시 */ , FSRG_ID /* 최초등록자ID */ , LSCHG_DTM /* 최초변경일시 */ , LSCHG_ID /* 최종변경자ID */ ) VALUES ( #{CORP_C} , #{BSN_CTC_SQNO} , #{RCST_ID} , '1' , NULL , #{RMK_CNTN} , 'N' , GETDATE() , #{GUSRID} , GETDATE() , #{GUSRID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE /*+ update_TB_CO_D_BSN_CTC */ TB_CO_D_BSN_CTC SET RC_STS_C = #{RC_STS_C} /* 접수상태코드 */ , RC_DTM = (CASE WHEN #{RC_STS_C} = '2' AND #{RC_DTM} = '' THEN GETDATE() ELSE CONVERT(DATETIME, #{RC_DTM}) END) , RMK_CNTN = #{RMK_CNTN} /* 비고내용 */ , LSCHG_DTM = GETDATE() /* 최초변경일시 */ , LSCHG_ID = #{GUSRID} /* 최종변경자ID */ WHERE 1=1 AND CORP_C = #{CORP_C} AND BSN_CTC_SQNO = #{BSN_CTC_SQNO} AND RCST_ID = #{RCST_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT /*+ select_TB_CO_D_BSN_CTC */ A.CORP_C /* 회사코드 */ , A.BSN_CTC_SQNO /* 업무연락일련번호 */ , A.RCST_ID /* 접수자ID */ , A.RC_STS_C /* 접수상태코드 */ , A.RC_DTM /* 접수일시 */ , A.RMK_CNTN /* 비고내용 */ , A.DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , CONVERT(CHAR(23), A.FSRG_DTM, 20) AS FSRG_DTM /* 최초등록일시 */ , A.FSRG_ID /* 최초등록자ID */ , CONVERT(CHAR(23), A.LSCHG_DTM, 20) AS LSCHG_DTM /* 최초변경일시 */ , A.LSCHG_ID /* 최종변경자ID */ FROM TB_CO_D_BSN_CTC A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CORP_C = #{CORP_C} AND A.BSN_CTC_SQNO = #{BSN_CTC_SQNO} AND A.RCST_ID = #{GUSRID}
